Email Marketing is another "Necessary Evil" of Web Development. Given the various platform in which people check their emails you have to code like it's 1999 to ensure your message is received as designed (even if people are still using Outlook 2007). I am up-to-date with best practices, CAN-SPAM compliance, even cutting edge responsive layout solutions.
